About the Game



The player takes on the role of Kyosuke, who took his fianc√©e, Erisa, to visit a lonely island in the sea. They attended a mysterious festival of the island's god, but the island seemed to be dormant with a great fear from the abyss‚Ä¶in an endless nightmare, the cute fianc√©e Erisa was abused and assaulted by others ‚Äì and unspeakable things ‚Äì at their will, with hardly any clothes on.

‚ÄúNo matter how many times I have to do it, I will save you!‚Äù

I believed that I would be with her all my life.



That was why I would never give up so easily.



And in an endless loop, I met a mysterious purple-haired girl. What secrets did this girl and this desert island hold?

‚óÜ Game Features


‚óá 24 basic CGs, including more than 300 differentials
‚óá Game text: 100,000
‚óá Two main female characters and three secondary female characters
‚óá A Cthulhu-style game with an infinite flow storyline
‚óá Contains group sex, tentacles, and grotesque scenes
‚óá Game endings: 2 types

‚óÜFeatured Systems


‚óáFull CG mode can be turned on in the environment setting, and HCG can be freely browsed.
‚óáPressure-Free Operation Support one-click mouse operation-Fast text-to-text system

data.short_description: Kyosuke and his fianc√©e, Erisa, are visiting an isolated island in the sea and attending a mysterious festival to make a sacrifice to the island's gods. It should have been a romantic holiday, but the island seemed to be overshadowed by a great fear coming from the abyss...
data.supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Russian, Japanese*, Thai, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Korean, Vietnamese, Spanish - Spain, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or sexual acts , extreme violence, sexual assault , non-consensual sex, incest , drug abuse, self-harm, suicide, , General Mature Content.
